Course Resources

These resources are good sources of more in-depth knowledge of the concepts and practices taught in this course. Use the resources to apply the concepts and to expand your knowledge of integrating the science practices into your adult education classroom.

 

Links to Explore

Topic Brief: Identification of Specific Learning Disabilities: From US Department of Education, Office of Special Education Programs’ IDEA website http://idea.ed.gov/object/fileDownload/model/TopicalBrief/field/PdfFile/primary_key/23
